segments.source_content:
---
slug: /195
title: "This Week In React #195: Compiler, Refactoring components, XState Store, Next.js, Redwood, Vitale, Astro, LLMs, Astro, Dédale, XR, tldraw, RN + Amazon, RN new styles, Gesture Handler, Reanimated, TC39, Node, TypeScript..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 08-07-2024
---
Another calm week in the React world. No huge announcement, but many great community articles to read.

translations.fr: Une autre semaine calme dans l'écosystème React. Pas d'annonce majeure, mais de nombreux excellents articles communautaires à lire.
translations.en: Une autre semaine calme dans l'écosystème React. Pas d'annonce majeure, mais de nombreux excellents articles communautaires à lire.
translations.zh-hans: React 社区度过了平静的一周。虽然没有重大发布，但涌现了许多优质的社区技术文章值得阅读。

segments.source_content: Node.js v22.6 is out with experimental TypeScript support! 🎉

translations.fr: Node.js v22.6 est sorti avec le support expérimental de TypeScript ! 🎉
translations.en: Node.js v22.6 est disponible avec le support expérimental de TypeScript ! 🎉
translations.zh-hans: Node.js v22.6 已发布，支持实验性 TypeScript 功能！🎉

segments.source_content: Check our partner [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) (🇵🇱 Wrocław - Sept 5-6), formerly named React Native EU. Get a 10% discount with code "TWIR". They really have a stunning speakers lineup this year!

Obtenez 10% de réduction avec le code "TWIR". Ils ont vraiment un panel d'intervenants exceptionnel cette année !
translations.en: Découvrez notre partenaire [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) (🇵🇱 Wrocław - 5-6 sept), anciennement React Native EU. Bénéficiez de 10% de réduction avec le code "TWIR". Ils ont un lineup d'intervenants exceptionnel cette année !
translations.zh-hans: 欢迎关注我们的合作伙伴 [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) (🇵🇱 波兰弗罗茨瓦夫 - 9月5-6日)，该会议前身为 React Native EU。使用优惠码 "TWIR" 可享 9 折优惠。今年的演讲嘉宾阵容堪称豪华！

translations.fr: **[WorkOS : Plateforme d'identité moderne pour les SaaS B2B](https://workos.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=q32024)**
translations.zh-hans: **[WorkOS：面向 B2B SaaS 的现代身份平台](https://workos.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=q32024)**

segments.source_content: With WorkOS you can start selling to enterprises with just a few lines of code.

translations.fr: Avec WorkOS, vous pouvez commencer à vendre aux entreprises avec seulement quelques lignes de code.
translations.en: Avec WorkOS, vous pouvez commencer à vendre aux entreprises avec seulement quelques lignes de code.
translations.zh-hans: 通过 WorkOS，仅需少量代码即可启动面向企业客户的销售业务。

segments.source_content: 🔐 WorkOS AuthKit supports a complete user management solution along with **SSO, SCIM, RBAC, & FGA**.

translations.fr: 🔐 WorkOS AuthKit propose une solution complète de gestion des utilisateurs avec **SSO, SCIM, RBAC et FGA**.
translations.en: 🔐 WorkOS AuthKit propose une solution complète de gestion des utilisateurs avec **SSO, SCIM, RBAC & FGA**.
translations.zh-hans: 🔐 WorkOS AuthKit 提供完整的用户管理方案，支持 **SSO、SCIM、RBAC 和 FGA**。

segments.source_content: 🏗️ The APIs are **flexible, easy-to-use, and modular**. Pick and choose what you need and integrate in minutes.

translations.fr: 🏗️ Les API sont **flexibles, faciles à utiliser et modulaires**. Choisissez ce dont vous avez besoin et intégrez en quelques minutes.
translations.en: 🏗️ Les API sont **flexibles, faciles à utiliser et modulaires**. Choisissez ce dont vous avez besoin et intégrez en quelques minutes.
translations.zh-hans: 🏗️ API 设计**灵活易用且模块化**，可按需选择功能并实现分钟级集成。

segments.source_content: 🎨 Design and user experience are everything. From the quality of our documentation to how your users onboard, we **remove all the unnecessary complexity for developers**.

translations.fr: 🎨 Le design et l'expérience utilisateur sont primordiaux. De la qualité de notre documentation à l'intégration de vos utilisateurs, nous **supprimons toute complexité inutile pour les développeurs**.
translations.en: 🎨 Le design et l'expérience utilisateur sont primordiaux. De la qualité de notre documentation à l'onboarding de vos utilisateurs, nous **éliminons toute complexité inutile pour les développeurs**.
translations.zh-hans: 🎨 设计体验至关重要。从文档质量到用户引导流程，我们**为开发者消除了所有不必要的复杂性**。

segments.source_content: ✨ AuthKit is **free up to 1 million MAUs** and includes bot protection, MFA, RBAC, & more.

translations.fr: ✨ AuthKit est **gratuit jusqu'à 1 million d'utilisateurs actifs mensuels (MAU)** et inclut la protection contre les bots, MFA, RBAC, et plus encore.
translations.en: ✨ AuthKit est **gratuit jusqu'à 1 million d'utilisateurs actifs mensuels** et inclut la protection contre les bots, MFA, RBAC et plus encore.
translations.zh-hans: ✨ AuthKit **前 100 万月活用户免费**，包含机器人防护、MFA、RBAC 等功能。

segments.source_content: 🤝 WorkOS is trusted by hundreds of leading startups like **Perplexity**, **Vercel**, & **Webflow**.

translations.fr: 🤝 WorkOS est utilisé par des centaines de startups leaders comme **Perplexity**, **Vercel** et **Webflow**.
translations.en: 🤝 WorkOS est utilisé par des centaines de startups leaders comme **Perplexity**, **Vercel** et **Webflow**.
translations.zh-hans: 🤝 WorkOS 已获 **Perplexity**、**Vercel** 和 **Webflow** 等数百家领先初创企业信任。

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [Reactile – a new approach to React-based web apps. Create your own views. Let it handle your windows and widgets in a single browser tab](https://www.reactile.net/?utm_source=reactnewsletter)
- 🐦 [Zuckerberg calling out React as one of Meta’s major open source initiatives](https://x.com/Vjeux/status/1818766264833392763)
- 🐦 [Visual editing with ReactBricks using RSC](https://x.com/rauchg/status/1819383553668370440)
- 📖 [Revised ”Redux Essentials" tutorial](https://redux.js.org/tutorials/essentials/part-1-overview-concepts)
- 🗓️ [React-Africa](https://react-africa.com/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇲🇦 Casablanca - 29 November - Line up is online, check, and apply a 10% discount on tickets with code TWIR !
- 📜 [React Compiler, How Does It Work?](https://yongseok.me/blog/en/react_compiler_1/): A 4-part series going really deep on the React Compiler code, explaining the Babel Plugin, useMemoCache, HIR/SSA transformations. That’s a lot of implementation details to read, and very technical, but there are also great overviews that describe the main algorithms at the end of each post. It operates on individual functions, with an AST “lowered” to a Hight-level Intermediate Representation (HIR) that also permits to decouple the compiler from Babel. A quite advanced piece of technology!
- 📜 [Avoiding premature abstraction with Unstyled React Components](https://buildui.com/posts/avoiding-premature-abstraction-with-unstyled-react-components): Sam refactors a concrete Form button to a headless LoadingButton abstraction that remains flexible and doesn’t prematurely abstract styling. I agree, and once time comes you can still create another styled abstraction on top.
- 📜 [Common Sense Refactoring of a Messy React Component](https://alexkondov.com/refactoring-a-messy-react-component/): Alex explains his process to refactor a bloated real-world Form component. I do the same: extracting sub-components, custom hooks, and helper code from the main component usually improves clarity.
- 📜 [Introducing XState Store](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/introducing-x-state-store): Dominik (React Query) likes Zustand, but explains why he now finds XState Store a more compelling option. It’s quite similar but more opinionated (separate state/actions, event-driven…). Daishi answered you can get a similar interface with his new [Zustand-xs middleware](https://github.com/zustandjs/zustand-xs). I explained ([tweet](https://x.com/sebastienlorber/status/1821166302469194062)) why I’m not always a fan of an event-driven interface.
- 📜 [Using Notion as my CMS with Next.js](https://jordaneldredge.com/notes/notion-cms/): Describes a setup to reduce the friction of creating and publishing notes. Notion content is first converted as Markdown, and then renderer in a Next.js app.
- 📜 [Next.js’s unstable_cache() demystified](https://jordaneldredge.com/notes/unstable_cache/): Some notes on the dangers of returning classes, and a link to an interesting related article/package listing even more caching gotchas.
- 📜 [Build your own React state management library in under 40 lines of code](https://paripsky.github.io/blog/build-your-own-react-state-management/): Creates a custom external store and reads it in React with… useSyncExternalStore + 2 improvement suggestions such as adding an Immer integration.
- 📜 [GitHub Vitale - Live notebooks in VS Code for JavaScript/TypeScript, web development, and AI experimentation](https://githubnext.com/projects/vitale/): The GitHub Next team introduced a new Notebook technology (like Jupyter) for interactive exploratory coding based on Vite. It supports rendering a React component in a notebook cell.
- 📜 [Frontend Security Checklist](https://www.trevorlasn.com/blog/frontend-security-checklist): Includes examples of mitigating XSS and CSRF attacks in a React context.
- 📜 [The Art of Dithering and Retro Shading for the Web (with React Three Fiber)](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/the-art-of-dithering-and-retro-shading-web/)
- 🔨 [Dédale - Email template development environment, based on React Email](https://bireme.io/en/blog/announcing-dedale)
- 📦 [Redwood 8.0 RC](https://github.com/redwoodjs/redwood/releases/tag/v8.0.0-rc.1114): New version of the full-stack React framework is now in release candidate. It adds SSR and RSC support (experimental), Vite 5, Prettier 3. See the [v8 upgrade guide](https://community.redwoodjs.com/t/redwood-v8-0-0-upgrade-guide/7250). They also plan to introduce soon a Background Jobs feature.
- 📦 [Vercel AI SDK 3.3 - useChat() supports file attachments, useObject() streams structured data](https://vercel.com/blog/vercel-ai-sdk-3-3): With structured data based on Zod schemas, LLMs are getting easier to use for devs. Note that [OpenAI also announced support for structured output with Zod support](https://openai.com/index/introducing-structured-outputs-in-the-api/)!
- 📦 [Astro 4.13 - stable request rewriting, stable content collections JSON schemas](https://astro.build/blog/astro-4130/)
- 📦 [react-three/xr 6.1 - WebXR Anchor API, Hit Testing API, DOM Overlay API, experimental Emulator](https://github.com/pmndrs/xr/releases/tag/v6.1.0)
- 📦 [Tldraw sync - self-hostable real-time collaboration engine for React whiteboard drawing app](https://tldraw.substack.com/p/announcing-tldraw-sync)
- 🎥 [Theo - Server Islands are really cool](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uBxehYwQox4)
- 🎥 [Jack Herrington - NextJS Feature Flagging Made Easy](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M1Rj1xSm3SM)
- 🎥 [UI Engineering - Why React is Declarative?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TVmRuP0_RGM)
- 🎥 [Expo - What React devs need to know about React Native](https://www.youtube.com/live/iB7sc-fzpWw)
- 🎙️ [Syntax - Why the jQuery Creator Uses React and Typescript - John Resig](https://syntax.fm/show/800/why-the-jquery-creator-uses-react-and-typescript-john-resig?utm_source=thisweekinreact)
- 🎙️ [This Month in React - July 2024 - State of JS, React, HTML](https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/reactiflux/episodes/TMiR-2024-07-State-of-JS--React--HTML-e2mplrc)

[React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) is two incredible days of learning, networking, and innovation in the heart of Europe. Formerly known as React Native EU, [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) is now the ultimate gathering for React and React Native enthusiasts. What's in it for you this year?

translations.fr: [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) ce sont deux jours exceptionnels d'apprentissage, de réseautage et d'innovation au cœur de l'Europe. Anciennement connue sous le nom de React Native EU, [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) est désormais le rassemblement ultime des passionnés de React et React Native. Qu'attendez-vous cette année ?
translations.en: [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) est deux jours incroyables d'apprentissage, de réseautage et d'innovation au cœur de l'Europe. Anciennement connue sous le nom de React Native EU, [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) est désormais le rendez-vous ultime des passionnés de React et React Native. Que vous réserve cette édition ?
translations.zh-hans: [React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) 是一场为期两天、在欧洲中心地带举办的精彩盛会，聚焦学习、交流与创新。前身为 React Native EU，[React Universe Conf](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) 如今已成为 React 和 React Native 爱好者的终极聚会。今年有哪些亮点？

segments.source_content:
- **Exceptional lineup:** Dan Abramov, Evan Bacon, Kent C. Dodds, Delba de Oliveira, Marc Rousavy, and many other great speakers.
- **Hot topics:** New architecture, React Server Components, Static Hermes, and Out-of-Tree platforms.
- **Practical insights** on cross-platform app development with React Native.

translations.fr:
- **Programme exceptionnel :** Dan Abramov, Evan Bacon, Kent C. Dodds, Delba de Oliveira, Marc Rousavy et bien d'autres grands intervenants.
- **Sujets brûlants :** Nouvelle architecture, React Server Components, Static Hermes et plates-formes Out-of-Tree.
- **Informations pratiques** sur le développement d'applications multiplateformes avec React Native.
translations.en:
- **Programme exceptionnel :** Dan Abramov, Evan Bacon, Kent C. Dodds, Delba de Oliveira, Marc Rousavy et bien d'autres grands intervenants.
- **Sujets brûlants :** Nouvelle architecture, React Server Components, Hermes statique et plateformes hors arborescence.
- **Conseils pratiques** sur le développement d'applications multiplateformes avec React Native.
translations.zh-hans:
- **强大阵容：** Dan Abramov、Evan Bacon、Kent C. Dodds、Delba de Oliveira、Marc Rousavy 等众多顶尖演讲者
- **前沿议题：** 新架构、React Server Components、Static Hermes 及 Out-of-Tree 平台
- **实践洞见：** 关于使用 React Native 进行跨平台应用开发的实用指南

segments.source_content: Use promo code **TWIR** for **10% discount** on your ticket. translations.en: Utilisez le code promo **TWIR** pour **une réduction de 10 %** sur votre billet. Réservez votre place [ICI](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter) et rendez-vous à Wrocław !
translations.zh-hans: 使用优惠码 **TWIR** 可享门票 **9折优惠**。立即[预订席位](https://www.reactuniverseconf.com/?utm_campaign=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_source=RUC%202024%20-%20TWIR%20Nesletter&utm_medium=TWIR%20NesletterOrganic&utm_content=TWIR%20Nesletter)，我们在弗罗茨瓦夫不见不散！

segments.source_content:
- 💸 [React Native Mastery - The only course you need to Master React Native & Expo](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=email)
- 🐦 [Why the Hermes team favors JSI NativeState over HostObject](https://x.com/tmikov/status/1820266381545468200)
- 🐦 [Experimental tree shaking support landed for Expo](https://x.com/baconbrix/status/1816488585409052925): Experimentally available in SDK 52 (which is in canary)
- 🐦 [Styles coming to React Native - Linear gradients, box shadows, CSS filters, % flex gaps](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1821039004671741984)
- 👀 [React Native PR - Linear gradient in React Native under experimental backgroundImage style prop](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/45434)
- 📜 [From JS to Fire OS - React Native for Amazon Devices](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/get-started-with-react-native-for-amazon-fire-os-51j8): Reminder that RN can be used to build apps for Fire Tablets and Fire TVs, as Fire OS is based on Android.
- 📜 [TV Navigation in React Native: A Guide to using TVFocusGuideView](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/tv-navigation-in-react-native-a-guide-to-using-tvfocusguideview-302i): I’m really excited about RN beyond just phones and tablets, so I appreciate articles on how to best leverage platform specific behaviors like this article does for tvOS and Android TV.
- 📜 [Xcode UI debugging with Quick Look](https://www.oskarkwasniewski.dev/blog/xcode-quick-look-debugging): Comes in handy if you happen to work in Xcode a lot (I don’t 😅).
- 📜 [My visit to Chain React 2024 (and some tips for going to conferences)](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/my-visit-to-chain-react-2024-nfj): Warning - if you didn’t go to Chain React yourself, this article will give you major FOMO, but I still enjoyed reading this.
- 📦 [React Native 0.75.0-rc.7 - update CLI to 14.0](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.75.0-rc.7)
- 📦 [React Native 0.74.5 - minor fixes](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.74.5)
- 📦 [react-native-gesture-handler 2.18.0 - Now has ReanimatedSwipeable as a standalone component, adds a couple improvements and support for RN 0.75](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.18.0)
- 📦 [react-native-svg 15.5.0 - Minor release introducing new filters, CSS filters API on FilterImage component and many bug fixes](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-svg/releases/tag/v15.5.0)
- 📦 [react-native-reanimated 3.15.0 - ReducedMotionConfig, EntryExitTransition, CurvedTransition, RN 0.75 support and a lot of fixes](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-reanimated/releases/tag/3.15.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm - React Native Server Defined Rendering](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6Mrar0r3kg)
- 🎥 [Reactiiive - The secret behind Jotai and MMKV (React Native)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AR2PN38ovo)
- 🎥 [notJust.dev - Building the iOS 18 Photos App with React Native and Reanimated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZHRFNpYkAY)
- 🎙️ [PodRocket - Using RSCs in Expo Router with Evan Bacon](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/using-rscs-expo-router-evan-bacon)

translations.fr:
- 💸 [React Native Mastery - Le seul cours dont vous avez besoin pour maîtriser React Native & Expo](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=email)
- 🐦 [Pourquoi l'équipe Hermes préfère JSI NativeState à HostObject](https://x.com/tmikov/status/1820266381545468200)
- 🐦 [Le support expérimental du tree shaking est arrivé pour Expo](https://x.com/baconbrix/status/1816488585409052925) : Disponible expérimentalement dans le SDK 52 (version canary)
- 🐦 [Styles à venir dans React Native - Dégradés linéaires, ombres de boîte, filtres CSS, écarts flex en %](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1821039004671741984)
- 👀 [PR React Native - Dégradé linéaire sous la prop expérimentale backgroundImage](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/45434)
- 📜 [De JS à Fire OS - React Native pour les appareils Amazon](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/get-started-with-react-native-for-amazon-fire-os-51j8) : Rappel que RN peut être utilisé pour développer des applications pour les Fire Tablets et Fire TVs, Fire OS étant basé sur Android.
- 📜 [Navigation TV dans React Native : Guide d'utilisation de TVFocusGuideView](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/tv-navigation-in-react-native-a-guide-to-using-tvfocusguideview-302i) : Je suis vraiment enthousiaste concernant RN au-delà des téléphones et tablettes, donc j'apprécie les articles sur l'exploitation optimale des comportements spécifiques aux plateformes comme celui-ci pour tvOS et Android TV.
- 📜 [Débogage d'interface dans Xcode avec Quick Look](https://www.oskarkwasniewski.dev/blog/xcode-quick-look-debugging) : Utile si vous travaillez souvent dans Xcode (pas mon cas 😅).
- 📜 [Ma visite à Chain React 2024 (et conseils pour les conférences)](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/my-visit-to-chain-react-2024-nfj) : Attention - si vous n'êtes pas allé à Chain React, cet article pourrait provoquer un fort FOMO, mais j'ai tout de même apprécié sa lecture.
- 📦 [React Native 0.75.0-rc.7 - mise à jour du CLI vers 14.0](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.75.0-rc.7)
- 📦 [React Native 0.74.5 - correctifs mineurs](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.74.5)
- 📦 [react-native-gesture-handler 2.18.0 - Ajout de ReanimatedSwipeable en composant autonome, améliorations et support de RN 0.75](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.18.0)
- 📦 [react-native-svg 15.5.0 - Nouveaux filtres, API de filtres CSS sur le composant FilterImage et nombreux correctifs](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-svg/releases/tag/v15.5.0)
- 📦 [react-native-reanimated 3.15.0 - ReducedMotionConfig, EntryExitTransition, CurvedTransition, support RN 0.75 et nombreux correctifs](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-reanimated/releases/tag/3.15.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm - Rendu défini par le serveur dans React Native](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6Mrar0r3kg)
- 🎥 [Reactiiive - Le secret derrière Jotai et MMKV (React Native)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AR2PN38ovo)
- 🎥 [notJust.dev - Construire l'app Photos d'iOS 18 avec React Native et Reanimated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZHRFNpYkAY)
- 🎙️ [PodRocket - Utiliser les RSC dans Expo Router avec Evan Bacon](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/using-rscs-expo-router-evan-bacon)
translations.en:
- 💸 [React Native Mastery - Le seul cours dont vous avez besoin pour maîtriser React Native et Expo](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=email)
- 🐦 [Pourquoi l'équipe Hermes privilégie JSI NativeState plutôt que HostObject](https://x.com/tmikov/status/1820266381545468200)
- 🐦 [Support expérimental du tree shaking intégré à Expo](https://x.com/baconbrix/status/1816488585409052925): Disponible expérimentalement dans le SDK 52 (version canary)
- 🐦 [Styles à venir dans React Native - Dégradés linéaires, ombres de boîte, filtres CSS, écarts flex en %](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1821039004671741984)
- 👀 [PR React Native - Dégradé linéaire dans React Native via la propriété de style expérimentale backgroundImage](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/45434)
- 📜 [De JS à Fire OS - React Native pour les appareils Amazon](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/get-started-with-react-native-for-amazon-fire-os-51j8): Rappel que RN peut être utilisé pour créer des applications pour les Fire Tablets et Fire TVs, car Fire OS est basé sur Android.
- 📜 [Navigation TV dans React Native : un guide pour utiliser TVFocusGuideView](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/tv-navigation-in-react-native-a-guide-to-using-tvfocusguideview-302i): Je suis vraiment enthousiaste à propos de RN au-delà des téléphones et tablettes, donc j'apprécie les articles sur la façon de tirer le meilleur parti des comportements spécifiques à la plateforme comme cet article le fait pour tvOS et Android TV.
- 📜 [Débogage d'interface utilisateur Xcode avec Quick Look](https://www.oskarkwasniewski.dev/blog/xcode-quick-look-debugging): Cela peut être utile si vous travaillez souvent avec Xcode (moi, non 😅).
- 📜 [Ma visite à Chain React 2024 (et quelques conseils pour assister à des conférences)](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/my-visit-to-chain-react-2024-nfj): Attention - si vous n'êtes pas allé à Chain React vous-même, cet article va vous donner une grosse dose de FOMO, mais j'ai quand même apprécié sa lecture.
- 📦 [React Native 0.75.0-rc.7 - mise à jour du CLI en 14.0](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.75.0-rc.7)
- 📦 [React Native 0.74.5 - corrections mineures](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.74.5)
- 📦 [react-native-gesture-handler 2.18.0 - ReanimatedSwipeable désormais comme composant autonome, ajout de quelques améliorations et support de RN 0.75](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.18.0)
- 📦 [react-native-svg 15.5.0 - Version mineure introduisant de nouveaux filtres, l'API des filtres CSS sur le composant FilterImage et de nombreuses corrections de bugs](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-svg/releases/tag/v15.5.0)
- 📦 [react-native-reanimated 3.15.0 - ReducedMotionConfig, EntryExitTransition, CurvedTransition, support de RN 0.75 et de nombreuses corrections](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-reanimated/releases/tag/3.15.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm - Rendu défini par serveur dans React Native](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6Mrar0r3kg)
- 🎥 [Reactiiive - Le secret derrière Jotai et MMKV (React Native)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AR2PN38ovo)
- 🎥 [notJust.dev - Construire l'application Photos d'iOS 18 avec React Native et Reanimated](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZHRFNpYkAY)
- 🎙️ [PodRocket - Utilisation des RSC dans Expo Router avec Evan Bacon](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/using-rscs-expo-router-evan-bacon)
translations.zh-hans:
- 💸 [React Native Mastery - 掌握 React Native 和 Expo 的唯一课程](https://notjust.dev/react-native-mastery?utm_source=twir&utm_medium=email)
- 🐦 [为什么 Hermes 团队更倾向于 JSI NativeState 而非 HostObject](https://x.com/tmikov/status/1820266381545468200)
- 🐦 [实验性 tree shaking 支持已登陆 Expo](https://x.com/baconbrix/status/1816488585409052925)：在 SDK 52 中实验性可用（当前为 canary 版本）
- 🐦 [即将登陆 React Native 的样式 - 线性渐变、盒阴影、CSS 滤镜、百分比 flex 间隙](https://x.com/Baconbrix/status/1821039004671741984)
- 👀 [React Native PR - 在实验性 backgroundImage 样式属性下为 React Native 添加线性渐变](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/45434)
- 📜 [从 JS 到 Fire OS - 面向 Amazon 设备的 React Native](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/get-started-with-react-native-for-amazon-fire-os-51j8)：提醒：RN 可用于为 Fire 平板和 Fire TV 构建应用，因为 Fire OS 基于 Android。
- 📜 [React Native 中的电视导航：使用 TVFocusGuideView 的指南](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/tv-navigation-in-react-native-a-guide-to-using-tvfocusguideview-302i)：我对 RN 在手机和平板之外的领域感到非常兴奋，因此特别欣赏这类指导如何最佳利用平台特定行为（如本文针对 tvOS 和 Android TV）的文章。
- 📜 [使用 Quick Look 进行 Xcode UI 调试](https://www.oskarkwasniewski.dev/blog/xcode-quick-look-debugging)：若您频繁使用 Xcode 会非常实用（我不用 😅）。
- 📜 [Chain React 2024 参会见闻（及参会技巧）](https://dev.to/amazonappdev/my-visit-to-chain-react-2024-nfj)：警告 - 若您未亲临 Chain React，本文可能引发严重 FOMO（错失恐惧症），但我仍乐在其中。
- 📦 [React Native 0.75.0-rc.7 - 将 CLI 更新至 14.0](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.75.0-rc.7)
- 📦 [React Native 0.74.5 - 小修复](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.74.5)
- 📦 [react-native-gesture-handler 2.18.0 - 新增独立组件 ReanimatedSwipeable，多项改进及支持 RN 0.75](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-gesture-handler/releases/tag/2.18.0)
- 📦 [react-native-svg 15.5.0 - 小版本更新：新增滤镜、FilterImage 组件的 CSS 滤镜 API 及多项错误修复](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-svg/releases/tag/v15.5.0)
- 📦 [react-native-reanimated 3.15.0 - 新增 ReducedMotionConfig/EntryExitTransition/CurvedTransition，支持 RN 0.75 及大量修复](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-reanimated/releases/tag/3.15.0)
- 🎥 [Simon Grimm - React Native 服务器定义渲染](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-6Mrar0r3kg)
- 🎥 [Reactiiive - Jotai 与 MMKV 背后的秘密（React Native）](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AR2PN38ovo)
- 🎥 [notJust.dev - 使用 React Native 和 Reanimated 构建 iOS 18 照片应用](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZHRFNpYkAY)
- 🎙️ [PodRocket - 在 Expo Router 中使用 RSC（与 Evan Bacon 对谈）](https://podrocket.logrocket.com/using-rscs-expo-router-evan-bacon)

segments.source_content:
- 🐦 [TC39 meeting 103 - `RegExp.escape` stage 3, Concurrency Control + Unordered Async Iterator Helpers stage 1](https://x.com/robpalmer2/status/1819051033215049742)
- 📜 [How Google handles JavaScript throughout the indexing process](https://vercel.com/blog/how-google-handles-javascript-throughout-the-indexing-process)
- 📜 [Why Unknown Types Are Useful](https://michaeluloth.com/programming-types-unknown-why-useful/)
- 📜 [A different way to think about TypeScript](https://www.rob.directory/blog/a-different-way-to-think-about-typescript)
- 📜 [What if you used Container Units for… everything?](https://frontendmasters.com/blog/what-if-you-used-container-units-for-everything/)
- 📜 [Effect Best Practices](https://ethanniser.dev/blog/effect-best-practices/)
- 📦 [Node v22.6.0 - with Experimental TypeScript support](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/release/v22.6.0)
- 📦 [Rslib - The library build tool powered by Rsbuild](https://github.com/web-infra-dev/rslib)
- 📦 [Nx 19.5 - Stackblitz, Bun, Pnpm 9, Incremental Builds for Vite, Gradle Test Atomizer](https://nx.dev/blog/nx-19-5-adds-stackblitz-new-features-and-more)
